#load packages
```{r}
library(sf)
```


```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

# load data

```{r}
Aus_map <- st_read(here("raw_data/AustralianStates_SHP/STE_2021_AUST_GDA2020.shp")) 
```
```{r}
qld<-Aus_map %>%
  filter(STE_NAME21 == "Queensland")

plot(st_geometry(qld))
```


# reproject data

```{r}
qld_proj<-st_transform(qld, 3577)
plot(st_geometry(qld_proj))
```

```{r}
qld_leases <- st_read(here("raw_data/QLD_aqua/Current_land_based_marine_distances.shp")) 
```
```{r}
plot(st_geometry(qld_proj))
plot(st_geometry(qld_leases), add = TRUE)
```

# intersect layers

```{r}
qld_aqua_intersect<-st_intersection(qld_proj, qld_leases)

plot(st_geometry(qld_aqua_intersect))
```
